mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gsm_threshold( gsm_key, green_house_id, device_type, device_type_idx, update_date, low_value, high_value ) VALUES (#{gsmKey}, #{greenHouseId}, #{deviceType}, #{deviceTypeIdx}, NOW(), #{lowValue}, #{highValue}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE update_date = NOW(), low_value = #{lowValue}, high_value = #{highValue}

REPLACE INTO gsm_threshold( gsm_key, green_house_id, device_type, device_type_idx, update_date, low_value, high_value ) SELECT #{to_gsm_key}, (${to_gsm_key} * 100000) + (green_house_id % 100000), device_type, device_type_idx, update_date, low_value, high_value FROM gsm_threshold WHERE gsm_key = #{from_gsm_key}
